page.title: 20STREETS, MENZIESHILL,DUNDEE.
page.content: In{Menzieshill}most of the street names come from rivers in{Scotland, e.g.:-{Etive Gdns,Spey Drive,Leith {Walk,Thurso Cres and Dee Gdns.}Etive means-white pebble,Spey means-hawthorn Thurso means- bull-river and Dee means goddess.The river{Dee}is close to {Aberdeen},the river Etive is in{Argyll in the{SW}of Scotland.River{Spey}is the swiftest river in Scotland, it is in the{NE.}Leith is{SE}of Scotland. {Thurso}is up north. In{Gowrie Park}the names of the streets come from villages in the{NW of Scotland,e.g.{Ullapool Cres,Dornie {Pl,Lochinver Cres,Applecross Gdns. Ullapool means-place,Dornie means- pebble place,Lochinver means-Loch on the height and Applecross means-mouth of the crossan.
